attributes.action: instruct OFCOM to make High Definition TV available to owners of existing Freeview set-top boxes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
OFCOM have recently announced a trial of High Definition terrestrial TV using a new broadcasting standard that is incompatible with existing Freeview set top boxes and receivers. In order to receive these signals, viewers will have to buy yet another decoder, having only just bought one to cope with the analogue switch-off.

We call upon the Government to instruct OFCOM to abort this trial and to make HD content available to viewers using existing Freeview receivers.
